data.message: hellooooooooooooooooo Facebook can you all please respond to my inbox messages or my comments, I've been reaching out for an week now. this is insane!

replies.message: Hi Shirley. What can I help you with? -Hailey

my son has been reaching out to you'll after his Facebook page was removed, because you'll assumed he wasn't a real person. He has submitted his drivers license, and debit card photos to show that it is his page, I know he used a name that everyone knows him by, they asked to change the name and he did that and the page is still down. He's been more than understanding, he has family and friends on there that took a long time to find, now he can't reach them, but some have wrote on his fan page sending the photo of what his old messages now show up as on there end. His case hasn't been updating in the last 3-4days. What is going on, can we please resolve this matter :)
Hi Shirley. If your son has already submit the correct information, rest assured that our team will address it as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience! -Hailey

I have been dealing with the same issue myself I have been trying to contact everyone on facebook and I'm getting no help at all. I have been locked out of my Facebook work page My Little Peas In A Pod  I am the owner of that page.  I don't know why they would locked it . I'm getting no email replays back for this issue.. I'm starting get a little upset .. Can someone please help me with this. It's going to be three days and no help no answers.  Single parent and this is the only income I have coming in for Christmas for my children... Now I won't be able to get them much with this going on.
